About Me

My name is Matthew Ryan Evans, and I am a freelance front-end developer. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, and Javascript. I am currently studying Software Development at Western Governors University. The thing that excites me most about technology is that we have advanced to a state where we (the thinkers, the dreamers) are no longer bound by hardware limitations, but solely limited by the depth of our own imagination and ingenuity. If you dream it I can build it, these are the words I live by.
